Package alix.lucene

Class SAXIndexer

java.lang.Object
org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
alix.lucene.SAXIndexer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class SAXIndexer
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
An XML parser allowing to ndex XML or HTMTL. Index an xml file of lucene documents. React to the namespace uri xmlns:alix="http://alix.casa". The element <alix:document> contains a document. The element <alix:field> contains a field. See alix.xml for a full XML documentation.

NOTE: This indexer do not reuse fields and document object, because the fields provided by source are not predictable.

  • Method Details

    • setFileName

      public void setFileName​(java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.IOException
      Provide a filename for the documents to be processed. All document from this source will be indexed with this token. This keyword should be unique for the entire index. All documents from this filename will deleted before indexation.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
